T04bsa003_u:48: devatānāmṛṣīṇāṃ vā brahmaṇāṃ vā bhaviṣyati // SBca_1.23 //
T04bsa003_u:50: notpannapūrvaḥ svapne 'pi parārthe saṃbhavaḥ kutaḥ // SBca_1.24 //

T04bsa003_u:62: kuto vā tādṛśaṃ mitraṃ puṇyaṃ vā tādṛśaṃ kutaḥ // SBca_1.30 //

T04bsa003_u:71: atha yasya manaḥ prasādameti prasavettasya tato 'dhikaṃ phalam /

T04bsa003_u:78: saddharmaratnasya ca nirmalasya buddhātmajānāṃ ca guṇodadhīnām // SBca_2.1 //
T04bsa003_u:79: yāvanti puṣpāṇi phalāni caiva bhaiṣajyajātāni ca yāni santi /

T04bsa003_u:108: bhojyaiśca khādyairvividhaiśca peyais tebhyo nivedyaṃ ca nivedayāmi // SBca_2.16 //
T04bsa003_u:110: gandhopalipteṣu ca kuṭṭimeṣu kirāmi puṣpaprakarān manojñān // SBca_2.17 //
T04bsa003_u:128: dharmaṃ gacchāmi śaraṇaṃ bodhisattvagaṇaṃ tathā // SBca_2.26 //
T04bsa003_u:132: yanmayā paśunā pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritameva vā // SBca_2.28 //

T04bsa003_u:138: yatkṛtaṃ dāruṇaṃ pāpaṃ tatsarvaṃ deśayāmyaham // SBca_2.31 //
T04bsa003_u:147: apriyā na bhaviṣyanti priyo me na bhaviṣyati /

T04bsa003_u:152: tannimittaṃ tu yatpāpaṃ tatsthitaṃ ghoramagrataḥ // SBca_2.38 //
T04bsa003_u:156: āyasya cāgamo nāsti na mariṣyāmi kiṃ nvaham // SBca_2.40 //
T04bsa003_u:160: puṇyamekaṃ tadā trāṇaṃ mayā tacca na sevitam // SBca_2.42 //
T04bsa003_u:162: pramattena mayā nāthā bahu pāpamupārjitam // SBca_2.43 //
T04bsa003_u:170: tadāhaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi tasmin sthāne mahābhaye // SBca_2.47 //

T04bsa003_u:178: viraumyārtaravaṃ bhītaḥ sa māṃ rakṣatu pāpinam // SBca_2.51 //
T04bsa003_u:181: yaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva ca saṃtrastāḥ palāyante caturdiśam /

T04bsa003_u:188: naśyanti yeṣāṃ bhaiṣajyaṃ sarvadikṣu na labhyate // SBca_2.56 //
T04bsa003_u:193: adyaiva maraṇaṃ naiti na yuktā me sukhāsikā /
T04bsa003_u:194: avaśyameti sā velā na bhaviṣyāmyahaṃ yadā // SBca_2.59 //
T04bsa003_u:195: abhayaṃ kena me dattaṃ niḥsariṣyāmi vā katham /
T04bsa003_u:196: avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmi kasmānme susthitaṃ manaḥ // SBca_2.60 //
T04bsa003_u:198: yeṣu me 'bhiniviṣṭena gurūṇāṃ laṅghitaṃ vacaḥ // SBca_2.61 //
T04bsa003_u:200: ekākī kvāpi yāsyāmi kiṃ me sarvaiḥ priyāpriyaiḥ // SBca_2.62 //
T04bsa003_u:201: iyameva tu me cintā yuktā rātriṃdivaṃ tadā /
T04bsa003_u:202: aśubhānniyataṃ duḥkhaṃ niḥsareyaṃ tataḥ katham // SBca_2.63 //
T04bsa003_u:204: prakṛtyā yacca sāvadyaṃ prajñaptyāvadyameva ca // SBca_2.64 //

T04bsa003_u:212: anumode pramodena sukhaṃ tiṣṭhantu duḥkhitāḥ // SBca_3.1 //
T04bsa003_u:223: glānānāmasmi bhaiṣajyaṃ bhaveyaṃ vaidya eva ca /

T04bsa003_u:232: tyaktavyaṃ cenmayā sarvaṃ varaṃ sattveṣu dīyatām // SBca_3.11 //
T04bsa003_u:234: ghnantu nindantu vā nityamākirantu ca pāṃsubhiḥ // SBca_3.12 //
T04bsa003_u:235: krīḍantu mama kāyena hasantu vilasantu ca /
T04bsa003_u:236: dattastebhyo mayā kāyaścintayā kiṃ mamānayā // SBca_3.13 //
T04bsa003_u:237: kārayantu ca karmāṇi yāni teṣāṃ sukhāvaham /
T04bsa003_u:240: teṣāṃ sa eva hetuḥ syānnityaṃ sarvārthasiddhaye // SBca_3.15 //
T04bsa003_u:241: abhyākhyāsyanti māṃ ye ca ye cānye 'pyapakāriṇaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:244: pārepsūnāṃ ca naubhūtaḥ setuḥ saṃkrama eva ca // SBca_3.17 //
T04bsa003_u:256: tadvadeva ca tāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣiṣyāmi yathākramam // SBca_3.23 //

T04bsa003_u:338: te 'pi nāvīcikaṃ vahniṃ samudānayituṃ kṣamāḥ // SBca_4.30 //
T04bsa003_u:340: kṣaṇāt kṣipanti māṃ tatra balinaḥ kleśaśatravaḥ // SBca_4.31 //

T04bsa003_u:359: śītātapādivyasanaṃ sahante jagaddhitārthaṃ na kathaṃ sahe 'ham // SBca_4.40 //
T04bsa003_u:361: pratijñāya madātmāpi na kleśebhyo vimocitaḥ // SBca_4.41 //

T04bsa003_u:368: nirvāsitasyāpi tu nāma śatrordeśāntare sthānaparigrahaḥ syāt /

T04bsa003_u:370: kvāsau yāyānmanmanaḥstho nirastaḥ sthitvā yasmin madvadhārthaṃ yateta /

T04bsa003_u:403: mārite krodhacitte tu māritāḥ sarvaśatravaḥ // SBca_5.12 //

T04bsa003_u:415: cittarakṣāvrataṃ mukttvā bahubhiḥ kiṃ mama vrataiḥ // SBca_5.18 //

T04bsa003_u:455: evaṃ sarvāsvavasthāsu kāryaṃ buddhvā samācaret // SBca_5.38 //

T04bsa003_u:475: na kartavyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ sthātavyaṃ kāṣṭhavattadā // SBca_5.48 //
T04bsa003_u:477: sotprāsātiśayaṃ vakraṃ vañcakaṃ ca mano bhavet // SBca_5.49 //
T04bsa003_u:481: upasthānārthe me cittaṃ tasmāttiṣṭhāmi kāṣṭhavat // SBca_5.51 //

T04bsa003_u:499: tvattaścetpṛthagevāyaṃ tenātra tava ko vyayaḥ // SBca_5.60 //

T04bsa003_u:507: adhunā vada kasmāttvaṃ kāyamadyāpi rakṣasi // SBca_5.64 //

T04bsa003_u:514: na sthāsyatīti bhṛtyāya na vastrādi pradīyate /
T04bsa003_u:515: kāyo yāsyati khāditvā kasmāttvaṃ kuruṣe vyayam // SBca_5.68 //
T04bsa003_u:517: na hi vaitanikopāttaṃ sarvaṃ tasmai pradīyate // SBca_5.69 //
T04bsa003_u:527: pratīcchecchirasā vākyaṃ sarvaśiṣyaḥ sadā bhavet // SBca_5.74 //
T04bsa003_u:532: sarvārambhā hi tuṣṭyarthāḥ sā vittairapi durlabhā /
T04bsa003_u:534: na cātra me vyayaḥ kaścitparatra ca mahatsukham /
T04bsa003_u:535: aprītiduḥkhaṃ dveṣaistu mahadduḥkhaṃ paratra ca // SBca_5.78 //
T04bsa003_u:539: etāneva samāśritya buddhatvaṃ me bhaviṣyati // SBca_5.80 //
T04bsa003_u:541: guṇopakārikṣetre ca duḥkhite ca mahacchubham // SBca_5.81 //
T04bsa003_u:553: tulyāśaye tu tattyājyamitthaṃ na parihīyate // SBca_5.87 //
T04bsa003_u:554: dharmaṃ nirgaurave svasthe na śiroveṣṭite vadet /
T04bsa003_u:559: na cācāraṃ parityajya sūtramantraiḥ pralobhayet // SBca_5.90 //
T04bsa003_u:561: neṣṭaṃ jale sthale bhogye mūtrādeścāpi garhitam // SBca_5.91 //
T04bsa003_u:563: pralambapādaṃ nāsīta na bāhū mardayetsamam // SBca_5.92 //
T04bsa003_u:565: lokāprasādakaṃ sarvaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā ca varjayet // SBca_5.93 //
T04bsa003_u:574: rātriṃdivaṃ ca triskandhaṃ triṣkālaṃ ca pravartayet /
T04bsa003_u:576: yā avasthāḥ prapadyeta svayaṃ paravaśo 'pi vā /
T04bsa003_u:577: tāsvavasthāsu yāḥ śikṣāḥ śikṣettā eva yatnataḥ // SBca_5.99 //
T04bsa003_u:578: na hi tadvidyate kiṃcidyanna śikṣyaṃ jinātmajaiḥ /
T04bsa003_u:579: na tadasti na yatpuṇyamevaṃ viharataḥ sataḥ // SBca_5.100 //
T04bsa003_u:581: sattvānāmeva cārthāya sarvaṃ bodhāya nāmayet // SBca_5.101 //
T04bsa003_u:582: sadā kalyāṇamitraṃ ca jīvitārthe 'pi na tyajet /
T04bsa003_u:592: yato nivāryate yatra yadeva ca niyujyate /
T04bsa003_u:596: kāyenaiva paṭhiṣyāmi vākpāṭhena tu kiṃ bhavet /
T04bsa003_u:598: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ saṃprajanyarakṣaṇaṃ nāma pañcamaḥ paricchedaḥ //
T04bsa003_u:602: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:604: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukhamaśnute /
T04bsa003_u:605: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite // SBca_6.3 //
T04bsa003_u:609: saṃkṣepānnāsti tatkiṃcit krodhano yena susthitaḥ // SBca_6.5 //
T04bsa003_u:611: yaḥ krodhaṃ hanti nirbandhāt sa sukhīha paratra ca // SBca_6.6 //
T04bsa003_u:613: daurmanasyāśanaṃ prāpya dveṣo dṛpto nihanti mām // SBca_6.7 //
T04bsa003_u:619: atha nāsti pratīkāro daurmanasyena tatra kim // SBca_6.10 //
T04bsa003_u:623: duḥkhenaiva ca niḥsāraḥ cetastasmād dṛḍhībhava // SBca_6.12 //
T04bsa003_u:625: vṛthā sahante muktyarthamahaṃ kasmāttu kātaraḥ // SBca_6.13 //
T04bsa003_u:629: mahatkaṇḍvādiduḥkhaṃ ca kimanarthaṃ na paśyasi // SBca_6.15 //
T04bsa003_u:631: saukumāryaṃ na kartavyamanyathā vardhate vyathā // SBca_6.16 //
T04bsa003_u:633: paraśoṇitamapyeke dṛṣṭvā mūrcchāṃ vrajanti yat // SBca_6.17 //
T04bsa003_u:636: duḥkhe 'pi naiva cittasya prasādaṃ kṣobhayed budhaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:637: saṃgrāmo hi saha kleśairyuddhe ca sulabhā vyathā // SBca_6.19 //
T04bsa003_u:639: te te vijayinaḥ śūrāḥ śeṣāstu mṛtamārakāḥ // SBca_6.20 //
T04bsa003_u:641: saṃsāriṣu ca kāruṇyaṃ pāpādbhītirjine spṛhā // SBca_6.21 //
T04bsa003_u:643: sacetaneṣu kiṃ kopaḥ te 'pi pratyayakopitāḥ // SBca_6.22 //
T04bsa003_u:646: kupyāmīti na saṃcintya kupyati svecchayā janaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:647: utpatsya ityabhipretya krodha utpadyate na ca // SBca_6.24 //
T04bsa003_u:649: sarvaṃ tatpratyayabalāt svatantraṃ tu na vidyate // SBca_6.25 //
T04bsa003_u:651: na cāpi janitasyāsti janito 'smīti cetanā // SBca_6.26 //
T04bsa003_u:653: tadeva hi bhavābhīti na saṃcintyopajāyate // SBca_6.27 //
T04bsa003_u:654: anutpannaṃ hi tannāsti ka icchedbhavituṃ tadā /
T04bsa003_u:658: yaḥ pūrvavat kriyākāle kriyāyāstena kiṃ kṛtam /
T04bsa003_u:660: evaṃ paravaśaṃ sarvaṃ yadvaśaṃ so 'pi cāvaśaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:662: vāraṇāpi na yuktaivaṃ kaḥ kiṃ vārayatīti cet /
T04bsa003_u:665: īdṛśāḥ pratyayā asyetyevaṃ matvā sukhī bhavet // SBca_6.33 //
T04bsa003_u:666: yadi tu svecchayā siddhiḥ sarveṣāmeva dehinām /
T04bsa003_u:667: na bhavetkasyacidduḥkhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ kaścidicchati // SBca_6.34 //
T04bsa003_u:673: tadaiṣāṃ parakāyeṣu parihāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet // SBca_6.37 //
T04bsa003_u:675: na kevalaṃ dayā nāsti krodha utpadyate katham // SBca_6.38 //
T04bsa003_u:677: teṣu kopo na yukto me yathāgnau dahanātmake // SBca_6.39 //
T04bsa003_u:680: mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyate /
T04bsa003_u:681: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam // SBca_6.41 //
T04bsa003_u:684: tacchastraṃ mama kāyaśca dvayaṃ duḥkhasya kāraṇam /
T04bsa003_u:685: tena śastraṃ mayā kāyo gṛhītaḥ kutra kupyate // SBca_6.43 //
T04bsa003_u:687: tṛṣṇāndhena mayā tatra vyathāyāṃ kutra kupyate // SBca_6.44 //
T04bsa003_u:691: matkarmajanitā eva tathedaṃ kutra kupyate // SBca_6.46 //
T04bsa003_u:693: yena yāsyanti narakānmayaivāmī hatā nanu // SBca_6.47 //
T04bsa003_u:694: etānāśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
T04bsa003_u:695: māmāśritya tu yāntyete narakān dīrghavedanān // SBca_6.48 //
T04bsa003_u:699: eṣāmatra kimāyātaṃ yadyātmā rakṣito mayā // SBca_6.50 //
T04bsa003_u:700: atha pratyapakārī syāṃ tathāpyete na rakṣitāḥ /
T04bsa003_u:701: hīyate cāpi me caryā tasmānnaṣṭāstapasvinaḥ // SBca_6.51 //
T04bsa003_u:705: kāyaṃ na bādhate tena cetaḥ kasmātprakupyasi // SBca_6.53 //
T04bsa003_u:706: mayyaprasādo yo 'nyeṣāṃ sa māṃ kiṃ bhakṣayiṣyati /
T04bsa003_u:707: iha janmāntare vāpi yenāsau me 'nabhīpsitaḥ // SBca_6.54 //
T04bsa003_u:709: naṅkṣyatīhaiva me lābhaḥ pāpaṃ tu sthāsyati dhruvam // SBca_6.55 //
T04bsa003_u:711: yasmācciramapi sthitvā mṛtyuduḥkhaṃ tadeva me // SBca_6.56 //
T04bsa003_u:712: svapne varṣaśataṃ saukhyaṃ bhuktvā yaśca vibudhyate /
T04bsa003_u:713: muhūrtamaparo yaśca sukhī bhūtvā vibudhyate // SBca_6.57 //
T04bsa003_u:716: labdhvāpi ca bahūṃllābhān ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhānyapi /
T04bsa003_u:717: riktahastaśca nagnaśca yāsyāmi muṣito yathā // SBca_6.59 //
T04bsa003_u:718: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet /
T04bsa003_u:719: puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu // SBca_6.60 //
T04bsa003_u:723: parāyaśaskare 'pyevaṃ kopaste kiṃ na jāyate // SBca_6.62 //
T04bsa003_u:727: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā // SBca_6.64 //
T04bsa003_u:731: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ // SBca_6.66 //
T04bsa003_u:733: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo 'parādhinam // SBca_6.67 //
T04bsa003_u:734: kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ /
T04bsa003_u:736: evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham /
T04bsa003_u:737: yena sarve bhaviṣyanti maitracittāḥ parasparam // SBca_6.69 //
T04bsa003_u:747: kārito 'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā // SBca_6.74 //
T04bsa003_u:748: na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati /
T04bsa003_u:751: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi // SBca_6.76 //
T04bsa003_u:752: idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam /
T04bsa003_u:753: na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhiḥ parāvarjanamuttamam // SBca_6.77 //
T04bsa003_u:754: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam /
T04bsa003_u:761: satkāramitvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ kiṃ paridahyase // SBca_6.81 //
T04bsa003_u:762: puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ /
T04bsa003_u:763: kuṭumbajīvinaṃ labdhvā na hṛṣyasi prakupyasi // SBca_6.82 //
T04bsa003_u:764: sa kiṃ necchasi sattvānāṃ yasteṣāṃ bodhimicchati /
T04bsa003_u:766: yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe /
T04bsa003_u:767: sarvathāpi na tatte 'sti dattādattena tena kim // SBca_6.84 //
T04bsa003_u:769: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi // SBca_6.85 //
T04bsa003_u:770: na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi /
T04bsa003_u:774: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava /
T04bsa003_u:775: athāpyartho bhavedevamanarthaḥ ko nvataḥ paraḥ // SBca_6.88 //
T04bsa003_u:777: yato narakapālāstvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti kumbhiṣu // SBca_6.89 //
T04bsa003_u:778: stutiryaśo 'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe /
T04bsa003_u:779: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me // SBca_6.90 //
T04bsa003_u:783: kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham // SBca_6.92 //
T04bsa003_u:785: tathā stutiyaśohānau svacittaṃ pratibhāti me // SBca_6.93 //
T04bsa003_u:787: paraḥ kila mayi prīta ityetatprītikāraṇam // SBca_6.94 //
T04bsa003_u:788: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā /
T04bsa003_u:789: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo 'pi me tataḥ // SBca_6.95 //
T04bsa003_u:791: kasmādanyaprasādena sukhiteṣu na me sukham // SBca_6.96 //
T04bsa003_u:795: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate // SBca_6.98 //
T04bsa003_u:797: apāyapātarakṣārthaṃ pravṛttā nanu te mama // SBca_6.99 //
T04bsa003_u:799: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhāddveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // SBca_6.100 //
T04bsa003_u:801: buddhādhiṣṭhānata iva dveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama // SBca_6.101 //
T04bsa003_u:803: kṣāntyā samaṃ tapo nāsti nanvetattadupasthitam // SBca_6.102 //
T04bsa003_u:806: yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate /
T04bsa003_u:807: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate // SBca_6.104 //
T04bsa003_u:809: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate // SBca_6.105 //
T04bsa003_u:815: etasmai prathamaṃ deyametatpūrvā kṣamā yataḥ // SBca_6.108 //
T04bsa003_u:816: kṣamāsiddhyāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ /
T04bsa003_u:819: anyathā me kathaṃ kṣāntirbhiṣajīva hitodyate // SBca_6.110 //
T04bsa003_u:821: sa evātaḥ kṣamāhetuḥ pūjyaḥ saddharmavanmayā // SBca_6.111 //
T04bsa003_u:823: etānārādhya bahavaḥ saṃpatpāraṃ yato gatāḥ // SBca_6.112 //
T04bsa003_u:825: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ // SBca_6.113 //
T04bsa003_u:826: āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ /
T04bsa003_u:827: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ // SBca_6.114 //
T04bsa003_u:831: na tu buddhaiḥ samāḥ kecidanantāṃśairguṇārṇavaiḥ // SBca_6.116 //
T04bsa003_u:833: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam // SBca_6.117 //
T04bsa003_u:837: sattvārādhanamutsṛjya niṣkṛtiḥ kā parā bhavet // SBca_6.119 //
T04bsa003_u:838: bhindanti dehaṃ praviśantyavīciṃ yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt /
T04bsa003_u:840: svayaṃ mama svāmina eva tāvad yadarthamātmanyapi nirvyapekṣāḥ /
T04bsa003_u:841: ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam // SBca_6.121 //
T04bsa003_u:842: yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munīndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
T04bsa003_u:844: ādīptakāyasya yathā samantān na sarvakāmairapi saumanasyam /
T04bsa003_u:845: sattvavyathāyāmapi tadvadeva na prītyupāyo 'sti dayāmayānām // SBca_6.123 //
T04bsa003_u:847: tadadya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditāstanmunayaḥ kṣamantām // SBca_6.124 //
T04bsa003_u:849: kurvantu me mūrghni padaṃ janaughā vighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthaḥ // SBca_6.125 //
T04bsa003_u:852: dṛśyanta ete nanu sattvarūpās ta eva nāthāḥ kimanādaro 'tra // SBca_6.126 //
T04bsa003_u:856: vikartuṃ naiva śaknoti dīrghadarśī mahājanaḥ // SBca_6.128 //
T04bsa003_u:857: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam /
T04bsa003_u:858: tathā na durbalaṃ kaṃcidaparāddhaṃ vimānayet // SBca_6.129 //
T04bsa003_u:866: ihaiva saubhāgyayaśaḥsausthityaṃ kiṃ na paśyasi // SBca_6.133 //
T04bsa003_u:868: cakravartisukhaṃ sphītaṃ kṣamī prāpnoti saṃsaran // SBca_6.134 //
T04bsa003_u:869: iti prajñākaramativiracitāyāṃ bodhicaryāvatārapañjikāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitā nāma ṣaṣṭhaḥ paricchedaḥ //
T04bsa003_u:871: evaṃ kṣamo bhajedvīryaṃ vīrye bodhiryataḥ sthitā /
T04bsa003_u:872: na hi vīryaṃ vinā puṇyaṃ yathā vāyuṃ vināgatiḥ // SBca_7.1 //
T04bsa003_u:880: tathāpi nidrāṃ yāsyeva caṇḍālamahiṣo yathā // SBca_7.5 //
T04bsa003_u:882: kathaṃ te rocate bhoktuṃ kathaṃ nidrā kathaṃ ratiḥ // SBca_7.6 //
T04bsa003_u:894: kṛtvā ca nārakaṃ karma kimevaṃ svasthamāsyate // SBca_7.12 //
T04bsa003_u:898: mūḍha kālo na nidrāyā iyaṃ naurdurlabhā punaḥ // SBca_7.14 //
T04bsa003_u:907: kimutāhaṃ naro jātyā śakto jñātuṃ hitāhitam /
T04bsa003_u:913: idaṃ tu me parimitaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃbodhisādhanam /
T04bsa003_u:922: māṃsāsthi tyajatastasya tadā kiṃ nāma duṣkaram // SBca_7.26 //
T04bsa003_u:924: mithyākalpanayā citte pāpātkāye yato vyathā // SBca_7.27 //
T04bsa003_u:925: puṇyena kāyaḥ sukhitaḥ pāṇḍityena manaḥ sukhi /
T04bsa003_u:926: tiṣṭhan parārthaṃ saṃsāre kṛpāluḥ kena khidyate // SBca_7.28 //
T04bsa003_u:936: ekaikasyāpi doṣasya yatra kalpārṇavaiḥ kṣayaḥ // SBca_7.33 //
T04bsa003_u:938: aprameyavyathābhājye noraḥ sphuṭati me katham // SBca_7.34 //
T04bsa003_u:942: vṛthā nītaṃ mayā janma kathaṃcillabdhamadbhutam // SBca_7.36 //
T04bsa003_u:944: na kṛtā śāsane kārā daridrāśā na pūritā // SBca_7.37 //
T04bsa003_u:945: bhītebhyo nābhayaṃ dattamārtā na sukhinaḥ kṛtāḥ /
T04bsa003_u:948: vipattirīdṛśī jātā ko dharme chandamutsṛjet // SBca_7.39 //
T04bsa003_u:949: kuśalānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ chandaṃ mūlaṃ munirjagau /
T04bsa003_u:960: sugatasutā bhavanti sugatasya puraḥ kuśalaiḥ // SBca_7.44 //
T04bsa003_u:968: anārambho varaṃ nāma na tvārabhya nivartanam // SBca_7.47 //
T04bsa003_u:970: anyacca kāryakālaṃ ca hīnaṃ tacca na sādhitam // SBca_7.48 //
T04bsa003_u:974: tasmānmayaiṣāṃ kartavyaṃ nāśakto 'haṃ yathā janaḥ // SBca_7.50 //
T04bsa003_u:975: nīcaṃ karma karotyanyaḥ kathaṃ mayyapi tiṣṭhati /
T04bsa003_u:976: mānāccenna karomyetanmāno naśyatu me varam // SBca_7.51 //
T04bsa003_u:978: āpadābādhate 'lpāpi mano me yadi durbalam // SBca_7.52 //
T04bsa003_u:983: mayā hi sarvaṃ jetavyamahaṃ jeyo na kenacit /
T04bsa003_u:984: mayaiṣa māno voḍhavyo jinasiṃhasuto hyaham // SBca_7.55 //
T04bsa003_u:985: ye sattvā mānavijitā varakāste na māninaḥ /
T04bsa003_u:986: mānī śatruvaśaṃ naiti mānaśatruvaśāśca te // SBca_7.56 //
T04bsa003_u:988: parapiṇḍāśino dāsā mūrkhā durdarśanāḥ kṛśā // SBca_7.57 //
T04bsa003_u:990: te 'pi cenmānināṃ madhye dīnāstu vada kīdṛśāḥ // SBca_7.58 //
T04bsa003_u:991: te mānino vijayinaśca ta eva śūrā ye mānaśatruvijayāya vahanti mānam /
T04bsa003_u:992: ye taṃ sphurantamapi mānaripuṃ nihatya kāmaṃ jane jayaphalaṃ pratipādayanti // SBca_7.59 //
T04bsa003_u:995: mahatsvapi hi kṛcchreṣu na rasaṃ cakṣurīkṣate /

T04bsa003_u:1525: ajānānaṃ yadi jñānaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ prasajyate /

T04bsa003_u:1531: sattvaṃ rajastamo vāpi na putro na pitā yataḥ /

T04bsa003_u:1544: karma kṛtvā vinaṣṭe hi phalaṃ kasya bhaviṣyati // SBca_9.71 //
T04bsa003_u:1546: nirvyāpāraśca tatrātmetyatra vādo vṛthā nanu // SBca_9.72 //
T04bsa003_u:1549: atītānāgataṃ cittaṃ nāhaṃ taddhi na vidyate /
T04bsa003_u:1553: yadi sattvo na vidyeta kasyopari kṛpeti cet /
T04bsa003_u:1555: kāryaṃ kasya na cetsattvaḥ satyamīhā tu mohataḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1556: duḥkhavyupaśamārthaṃ tu kāryamoho na vāryate // SBca_9.77 //
T04bsa003_u:1558: tato 'pi na nivartyaścet varaṃ nairātmyabhāvanā // SBca_9.78 //
T04bsa003_u:1559: kāyo na pādau na jaṅghā norū kāyaḥ kaṭirna ca /

T04bsa003_u:1561: na hastau nāpyayaṃ pārśvau na kakṣau nāṃsalakṣaṇaḥ /

T04bsa003_u:1582: vedanātvaṃ kathaṃ tasya yasya nānubhavātmatā // SBca_9.90 //
T04bsa003_u:1583: asti sūkṣmatayā duḥkhaṃ sthaulyaṃ tasya hṛtaṃ nanu /
T04bsa003_u:1592: apraveśe na miśratvamamiśratve na saṃgatiḥ // SBca_9.95 //
T04bsa003_u:1594: saṃsarge ca niraṃśatvaṃ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ nidarśaya // SBca_9.96 //
T04bsa003_u:1598: kimarthamayamāyāsaḥ bādhā kasya kuto bhavet // SBca_9.98 //

T04bsa003_u:1605: na cāsti vedakaḥ kaścidvedanāto na tattvataḥ /
T04bsa003_u:1606: nirātmake kalāpe 'smin ka evaṃ bādhyate 'nayā // SBca_9.102 //

T04bsa003_u:1707: kutaḥ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā kiṃ priyaṃ vā kimapriyam /

T04bsa003_u:1792: sarvā diśaḥ śivāḥ santu sarveṣāṃ pathivartinām /
